content.prompt: Which of the following can be used to replace  /* missing constructor */  so that the object t is correctly created?

choices.label:
public Tester(int first, int second) 
{ 
   num1 = first; 
   num2 = second; 
}

public Tester(int first, int second) 
{ 
   num1 = 1; 
   num2 = 2; 
}

public Tester(int first, int second) 
{ 
   first = 10; 
   second = 20; 
}

public Tester(int first, int second) 
{ 
   first = num1; 
   second = num2; 
}

skill.text: 2.B: Write program code involving data abstractions.
